changeSet.sql: alter table BILLING_PROJECT add column OWNER_GROUP varchar(254), add constraint FK_PROJECT_OWNER_GROUP foreign key (OWNER_GROUP) references `GROUP`(NAME)

changeSet.sql: alter table BILLING_PROJECT add column USER_GROUP varchar(254), add constraint FK_PROJECT_USER_GROUP foreign key (USER_GROUP) references `GROUP`(NAME)
